ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] what weapon? and other questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. Magic weapons: Dragoon dirk, PGT and lots of others should be reasonbly cheap... Try looking at some of the spoiler sites.. Im not really up to speed
ygData.messageBody:
1. Magic weapons: Dragoon dirk, PGT and lots of others should be reasonbly
cheap... Try looking at some of the spoiler sites.. Im not really up to
speed anymore..

2. Songs when soloing: Whistling warsong + heal + what ever you need... (AOE
dot is good.. if you dare)... (you can have 3 songs going at a time.. Some
even do 4)

3. Bellow does indeed hit creatures that require magical weapons.


Musiker, almost retired minstrel, Bertox

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
> Sent: 15. januar 2002 10:42
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] what weapon? and other questions...
>
>
> Get a mage to summon you one, prob get it for free.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: compugeeke [mailto:compugeeke@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, January 15, 2002 1:43 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] what weapon? and other questions...
>
>
> Hi everybody!
>
> I am nearly ready to take on some Willo-whisps (i am almost lvl 11)
> but I need a good *cheap* magic weapon, as my tarnished broad sword
> aint gonna cut it. How much can I expect to pay for a weapon that
> will do the trick? I am on a tight budget right now, what with
> buying songs and learning to smith :)
>
> Also, when soloing which do you prefer: Anthem de arms, or Whistling
> warsong?
>
> Also Also, how hard is it to get that other level 9 song I heard can
> only be gotten in Luclin, "Magical Monologue" (of course I'll have
> to buy the exp first) so that i can save my Platinum and not have to
> buy a magic weapon?
>
> Also Also Also does the bellow that bards get at lvl 12 affect
> creatures that can only be hit with magic weapons, and does that song
> show you how much dammage you are delivering (whereas the chords of
> disonance only say "Large Spider winces" etc)?
>
> Thanks for listening!
>
> -fohat, level 10 half-elf Quelious Bard on Firiona Vie
>
>
